entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:50 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 02:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
